code: export var ADD_PERSON='ADD_PERSON';export var EDIT_PERSON='EDIT_PERSON';export var DELETE_PERSON='DELETE_PERSON';export var addPerson=function addPerson(data){return{type:ADD_PERSON,payload:data};};export var deletePerson=function deletePerson(id){return{type:DELETE_PERSON,payload:{id:id}};};export var updatePerson=function updatePerson(payload){return{type:EDIT_PERSON,payload:payload};};
